00085 class FunctionParameterValueBase {
00086     public:
00088 
00090         struct WrongParameterTypeException: public std::logic_error {
00092 
00096             WrongParameterTypeException(const std::string &_class,
00097                                         const std::string &_function,
00098                                         const std::string &_type):
00099                 std::logic_error("Tried to call default implementation for "+
00100                                  _class+"::"+_function+"("+_type+")!") { }
00101         };
00102 
00103         /* I have to declare the getters and setters for every type of
00104            derived classes that will be instantiated. PITA.
00105            what's worse, i have to define no-ops as default implementation,
00106            because otherwise the templated derived class would remain
00107            abstract. that totally breaks type-safety during compilation.      */
00109         virtual void setValue(const double &) {
00110             throw WrongParameterTypeException("FunctionParameterValueBase",
00111                                               "setValue", "double");
00112         }
00114         virtual void setValue(const unsigned &) {
00115             throw WrongParameterTypeException("FunctionParameterValueBase",
00116                                               "setValue", "unsigned");
00117         }
00119         virtual void setValue(const int &) {
00120             throw WrongParameterTypeException("FunctionParameterValueBase",
00121                                               "setValue", "int");
00122         }
00124         virtual void setValue(const std::string &) {
00125             throw WrongParameterTypeException("FunctionParameterValueBase",
00126                                               "setValue", "std::string");
00127         }
00128 
00130         virtual void setValue(const char *) = 0;
00131 
00132         virtual operator double() = 0;                  
00133         virtual operator unsigned() = 0;                
00134         virtual operator int() = 0;                     
00135         virtual operator std::string() = 0;             
00136 
00137         virtual std::string toString() = 0;             
00138     };
00139 
00141 
00152 template <typename T> class FunctionParameterValue:
00153         public FunctionParameterValueBase {
00154     public:
00156         FunctionParameterValue<T>(const T &_value): value(_value) { }
00157 
00159         virtual void setValue(const char *);
00160 
00163         virtual operator double() {
00164             throw WrongParameterTypeException("FunctionParameterValue", "operator double", "");
00165             return 0.;
00166         }
00167 
00170         virtual operator unsigned() {
00171             throw WrongParameterTypeException("FunctionParameterValue", "operator unsigned", "");
00172             return 0;
00173         }
00174 
00177         virtual operator int() {
00178             throw WrongParameterTypeException("FunctionParameterValue", "operator int", "");
00179             return 0;
00180         }
00181 
00184         virtual operator std::string() {
00185             throw WrongParameterTypeException("FunctionParameterValue", "operator std::string", "");
00186             return toString();
00187         }
00188 
00190         virtual std::string toString() {
00191             std::ostringstream o;
00192             o << value << std::ends;
00193             return o.str();
00194         }
00195     private:
00196         T value;                
00197 };

00200 
00219 class FunctionParameter {
00220     public:
00222         FunctionParameter(const std::string &_name,
00223                           const std::string &_description = "");
00224         ~FunctionParameter();
00225 
00227         operator double();
00229         operator unsigned();
00231         operator int();
00233         operator std::string();
00234 
00236         const std::string &getName() const;
00238         void setName(const std::string &_name);
00240         const std::string &getDescription() const;
00242         void setDescription(const std::string &_description);
00243 
00245 
00249         template<typename T> void setValue(FunctionParameterValue<T> *_value) {
00250             pImpl->value.reset ( _value );
00251         }
00252 
00254         void setValue(std::string _value);
00255 
00257 
00261         template<typename T> void setDefaultValue(FunctionParameterValue<T> *_defaultValue ) {
00262             pImpl->defaultValue.reset(_defaultValue);
00263         }
00264 
00266         FunctionParameterValueBase *value() const;
00268         FunctionParameterValueBase *defaultValue() const;
00269 
00270     private:
00271     /*  these accessors are never used, but i like to keep them around
00272         std::auto_ptr<FunctionParameterValueBase> value() {
00273             return pImpl->value;
00274         }
00275         const std::auto_ptr<FunctionParameterValueBase> value() const {
00276             return pImpl->value;
00277         }
00278         std::auto_ptr<FunctionParameterValueBase> defaultValue() {
00279             return pImpl->defaultValue;
00280         }
00281     */
00283         struct Impl {
00285             Impl(const std::string &_name,
00286                  const std::string &_description = ""):
00287                  name(_name), description(_description), value(0),
00288                  defaultValue(0) {}
00289             ~Impl() { }
00291             std::string name;
00293             std::string description;
00295             std::auto_ptr<FunctionParameterValueBase> value;
00297             std::auto_ptr<FunctionParameterValueBase> defaultValue;
00298         };
00299         Impl *pImpl;            
00300 };

00303 
00305 class ParameterFac {
00306     public:
00308         template <typename T>
00309                 FunctionParameter *createParameterWithValue(
00310                     const std::string &_name, const T &_value) {
00311             FunctionParameter *tmp = new FunctionParameter(_name);
00312             tmp->setValue(new FunctionParameterValue<T>(_value));
00313 
00314             return tmp;
00315         }
00316 
00318         template <typename T>
00319                 FunctionParameter *createParameterWithDefault(
00320                     const std::string &_name, const T &_default,
00321                     const std::string &_description = "") {
00322             FunctionParameter *tmp = new FunctionParameter(_name, _description);
00323             tmp->setDefaultValue(new FunctionParameterValue<T>(_default));
00324             tmp->setValue(new FunctionParameterValue<T>(_default));
00325 
00326             return tmp;
00327         }
00328 };
00329 
00331 
00334 typedef Loki::SingletonHolder<ParameterFac> ParameterFactory;
